Title: Relates to annual professional performance review of classroom teachers and building principals; repealer
Summary: Relates to annual professional performance review of classroom teachers and building principals; reduces the probationary period for assistants, superintendents, teachers and other school employees; repeals certain provisions of the education law.
ActClause: AN ACT to amend the education law, in relation to annual professional performance review of classroom teachers and building principals and to reducing the probationary period for assistants and other superintendents, teachers and other employees; and to repeal certain provisions of the education law relating thereto
